passes.description: Ensures ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
passes.help: Elements must only use allowed ARIA attributes

any.message: ARIA attributes are used correctly for the defined role

passes.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
passes.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

any.message: ARIA role is allowed for given element

nodes.html:
<input id="search" data-mage-init="{"quickSearch":{
                                  "formSelector":"#search_mini_form",
                                  "url":"https://www.keh.com/shop/search/ajax/suggest/",
                                  "destinationSelector":"#search_autocomplete"}
                             }" type="search" name="q" value="" placeholder="" class="input-text minisearch__input" maxlength="128" role="combobox" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="false" aria-autocomplete="both" autocomplete="off">

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div > section > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
